str_EB133F16: Part One: Meeting in the Coastal Waters
str_0773BEA9: So here we are at the beach.
str_CA0D8E82: Miranda and I have been planning to go on a trip together after exams for a long time.
str_09BFF82B: All exams are done, studying is behind us, and in three months we'll be leaving for different universities.
str_1B66C84E: So this trip should be our farewell to the old life and the start of something new.
str_90D3CE25: Hey, why are you standing up? Who's going to set up the tent?
str_BC20DBE4: Attention! Some of your actions may affect the course of the story.
str_9D930FCD: Can we at least swim? Come on, please! We walked so long to get here. I can't stand this heat anymore.
str_4D58287E: Well, what should I tell her?
str_F47E241D: Just be quick! Otherwise, we'll waste the whole day.
str_43743C85: Choose your appearance before starting the story
str_EBF79EA0: We entered the water, and goosebumps covered my whole body. The smell of salt and fresh air made me forget for a second that the whole world existed around us.
str_B1307960: The shimmer of the sun, reflected off the smooth and barely noticeable waves, like a kaleidoscope, playfully beckoned my body and mind to follow, into another, shadowy space.
str_F72B4F72: But Miranda's voice brought me back to reality...
str_DCE39A2D: Let's run! That way we'll get used to the water faster!
str_10B6BBD3: We ran towards the morning waves and, shouting, started splashing each other with water.
str_792B001D: Alright, we cooled off, that's enough. We still have to set up the tent.
str_2AE47509: We came out of the sea.
str_4E5BAF2E: Droplets of salt water sparkled like tiny crystals on our slightly tanned bodies.
str_297AFBDC: Our bodies quickly got used to the sea temperature, and we continued fooling around for a couple more minutes.
str_CA2C44CD: Something's unclear here, what color is our tent?
str_35BCF84F: Alright, don't forget the main thing!
str_13F61EBD: Check the tension of the tarp.
str_2928AD22: Excellent! Now let's think about the real fun.
str_A50B9826: Could we spend the whole day lounging on the beach today?
str_6B6A2799: We'll have time for that later. We need to find the coolest party here. We came for adventure!
str_8B06A37C: Of course, we'll go to a local band's concert tonight, I already checked everything. The concert is at 7:00 PM.
str_D1D1D024: Then we do have a couple of hours to lounge and sunbathe.
str_8ACE628C: Miranda and I laid out our towels and started sunbathing under the summer sun.
str_29847F87: Our bodies gradually warmed up, and our skin, moisturized with sunscreen, shone pleasantly.
str_637B9CA5: I noticed the outline of a yacht appearing in the coastal waters.
str_20D0F6B9: Miranda, look! There's a yacht out at sea, it's so big.
str_8B13C6B5: Well, more like medium-sized. But it's still interesting. Maybe there are some guys on it?
str_50B091BA: Seems like it's going to be hot today!
str_6720FCBB: The main thing is that they're nice people, who they are isn't that important!
str_A593FB37: Hmm. What's the difference, we're not going to approach them, are we?
str_C066BAD3: Yeah, baby! We're going to have a blast!
str_E58D036C: I don't know about nice, but I think they'll have something to surprise us with!
str_23C476A2: Miranda got up from her towel and started waving at the passing yacht.
str_2BB2E8E0: What are you doing? We don't know who's there!
str_5C1FE3AD: Probably some company of young and fun people, and wealthy too. Getting to know them won't hurt us!
str_C3067075: The yacht changed course and approached the shore. Two muscular male silhouettes were visible on it.
str_C5E0B7DB: Miranda looked at the yacht with interest.
str_9CBCCB38: The yacht stopped in the coastal waters of the beach, and the guys got on jet skis and headed towards us.
str_2EB1BFB3: I hope it was worth it...
str_ADAD6096: My god, look at those handsome guys, dibs on the dark-haired one.
str_2DA7F895: I looked over the young men. They really were very handsome.
str_2B802345: While Miranda was shamelessly staring at the yacht, the guys had already reached the shore and parked their jet skis.
str_6B622357: Hi, girls! I'm Edwin, and this is Mark!
str_2F7FA4E7: Hi, boys! My name is Miranda!
str_403F41F1: Miranda gave me a meaningful look, clearly indicating I should introduce myself.
str_8EE62C1A: Miranda suddenly pushed me aside and said: "How nice that we met".
str_04F3572B: Edwin, slightly embarrassed, smiled at me.
str_612FFDE3: This is Alice, we just got here today, but we're already ready to have a blast!
str_FAFCDDAD: Haha, you're quick. Do you live right on the beach?
str_DCB7D7DE: Stand up and wave with Miranda
str_AB7413D7: Stand up and look curiously towards the yacht.
str_959217CC: The guy, raising one eyebrow, looked puzzled at our tent, which stood alone on the sand.
str_96F82103: Do you live right on the beach?
str_13F16BED: Yes, but if we find a more interesting spot, we'll think about changing locations.
str_5FDC1D11: Yes, it's a great option to always be near the sea, watch sunsets and sunrises, fall asleep under the starry sky.
str_CB7CA2F6: Anyway, if we find a more interesting spot, we'll think about changing locations.
str_4A3440D6: I think it's a great option to always be near the sea, watch sunsets and sunrises, fall asleep under the starry sky.
str_D7CC0DA6: I mean, it might be dangerous, since it's a wild beach, there are no lifeguards or security here.
str_34433068: Well then, it's a good thing we met you, you can keep an eye on us!
str_5695D367: I think we can arrange that!
str_87ADDAA2: The guys sat down near us, and we chatted a bit.
str_D4032E09: It turned out that Edwin lives in this area and owns the nightclub we were planning to go to for the concert tonight.
str_9CB42A59: And Mark isn't from here at all. He only comes in the summer, relaxes, and runs one of his seasonal businesses here.
str_A907546C: So, are you staying here for long?
str_D790DD18: For a week. Why? Do you want to spend more time with us?
str_45D19FDE: Why? Do you want to spend more time with us?
str_EA6ACAC2: Edwin thinks you're flirting with him.
str_59E39F8E: Maybe we should exchange numbers, Alice? Just in case. In case we need that promised protection on the wild beach?
str_B972B3CC: Sorry, but you're moving too fast.
str_037EBE2E: Sorry, I didn't think it might seem like things are moving too quickly.
str_2DE47FFC: You know who's always ready to chat on the phone? That's right â€“ me! Mark, you can write down my number, by the way.
str_2D01285F: Yes, let's do it. Alice, what about you?
str_9A2F60C2: Mark glanced awkwardly at Miranda but decided to support her initiative.
str_714B8E9F: At that moment, Miranda gave me a reproachful look.
str_6182709B: The guys sat and chatted with us a bit more, and then started talking about continuing our acquaintance.
str_3ED61BC4: Maybe we can meet up tonight, after your concert?
str_8E58169F: Why not? I think that's a good idea.
str_DFFF7EA0: The guys leisurely got on their jet skis and headed towards the yacht.
str_A91B6678: Seems like we've been lying in the sun long enough. I felt my skin starting to sting a bit from sudden movements.
str_8AB9C36C: It's time to get ready for the concert.
str_DCEB51DD: Was I imagining it, or were you flirting with Mark?
str_BD04481F: Sorry, it was an accident. I didn't mean to upset you, I was just trying to be nice.
str_C585700E: Really? Tonight, it's better to be nice to Edwin, and leave Mark to me.
str_73557CBC: I hope so, because I really liked him.
str_994BDD22: It's not my fault I attract guys' attention. And besides, we're here on vacation. We'll leave soon and forget everything that happened.
str_3530C99E: You were staring so shamelessly at Mark. I told you I like him!
str_762A0BD2: You're imagining things, I just said hi to him.
str_C7C9C12F: They're very nice! How do you like Edwin?
str_03EF38A8: I don't think I need a vacation fling.
str_7B057D9E: He seemed like a nice guy to me.
str_CA32D845: I don't know, I kind of liked Mark.
str_7D3AB311: Alright, let's get ready for the concert.
str_FB33741F: I'm not sure I have suitable clothes.
str_5068E5EA: I thought a tent meant we'd be in the woods or on the beach all the time. I wasn't expecting this kind of vacation.
str_C6E5D3EE: Then take something from my clothes.
str_AF1DEAE0: All done, now we can go!
str_3DF0AC64: I think I hear some strange noise.
str_16807308: It's right near us. Let's go check it out.
str_0258ABB3: The girls moved away from the tent and saw a male figure. It seemed the man was talking to himself and nervously fidgeting with something in his hands.
str_D7791C8A: The figure suddenly turned around and walked straight towards us.
str_D23FD5B1: Said the man threateningly as he came up close to us.
str_BDC72224: Leggings and a see-through tank top
